numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that legacy students are more likely to be accepted.
2. If the income of the parents of a legacy student is higher, then the legacy student is especially likely to be accepted.
3. I wonder if legacy has more effect on the chance of being accepted than the income of parents has.
5. This issue relates to my community.
6. In a few years, I will go to college.
7. The headline is: Effect legacy has on acceptance rate.
